Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAccount
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAccount"
DeleteIdentity SOAP Command

Delete an Identity

must specify either {name} or {id} attribute to <identity>

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

DeleteIdentityRequest

    <DeleteIdentityRequest> ## DeleteIdentityRequest
        <identity [name="..."] [id="..."] /> ## NameId
    </DeleteIdentityRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <DeleteIdentityRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/identity Required (only 1) Details of the identity to delete.
/identity@name Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
Name
/identity@id Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
ID

DeleteIdentityResponse

    <DeleteIdentityResponse /> ## DeleteIdentityResponse
